title: New: Anie – Lovekill
content:
Sometimes I post certain pieces of music just because they grab my attention.

In the case of LA’s Anie, I can’t decide whether I absolutely love them, or detest them, but hey, it’s making me feel something; it’s anything but passive. Their debut outing, Lovekill is centred around one of the weirdest hooks of the year, it’s all bright, bubbly synths and the sort of lead vocal that immediately kicks up West Coast imagery. Adore it, or hate it? Maybe a bit of both. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
